item.title: Matching Engine
item.description: If you are looking to replace your current matching engine we got just what you need. Our matching engine will help you serve more customers, prevent downtime during peak hours and will increase the trust in your platform. It is build by traders for traders, leverages the latest techniques and programming languages (Rust), is fully verifiable and able to processes 300.000 orders per second.

item.title: Payment processing Engine
item.description: Our transaction engine takes care of consistency between transactions (withdraws and deposits) and user balances. It tracks the status of the transactions cryptocurrency/bank accounts and notifies the matching engine when a transaction is confirmed. The engine is modular and extendable allowing you to choose which service should sign, analyze and broadcast the transaction.

item.title: Scaling your platform
item.description: With our solutions, your trading platform can handle peak loads of over 300.000 trades/sec with the added benefit of being flexible enough to handle changing customer functional requirements.

item.title: Minimize the downtime of your trading platform.
item.description: Our focus on the quality of our components, efforts to be backward compatibility and our redundant deployments, minimize the downtime of your platform.

item.title: Storage engine
item.description: Storing historical order and trade information becomes expensive and difficult to manage. Trading data is requested by various actors which require different views and it can accumulate to millions of entries per user over time. You may have started with a simple database, but can no longer serve customers with data they request while paying a ton of hosting fees to your cloud providers. Our storage solution tackles this by providing your users instant access to their data at a very low total cost of ownership for you.
